text:
At the very top of the document:

"This document describes what a Multi-Processing Module is and how they are 
using by the Apache HTTP Server."

I think 'using' should be replaced with 'used'?

Also present in http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/mpm.html.

It seems like an obvious error (to me at least), which would make me think it 
would have been been already reported, but I searched the bug DB a couple of 
times and could not locate an entry, so hopefully I'm not duplicating someone 
else's report. :)
creator: apache_bugzilla@mail.jleh.com

text: This is fixed in CVS now and will be on the website soon. Thanks.
creator: erik@codefaktor.de
